nodes.excerpt: When you read an email you will see a numerical score just below the subject–a score between 0 and 100. A score of 100 means the email is very easy to read and a score of 0 means the email is very difficult to read.
nodes.title: Gmail inbox Readability Score - Calculating the readability score of an email
nodes.author: Argyrou Argyris

localize.description: 当你阅读一封电子邮件时，你会在主题下方看到一个数字分数-一个介于0到100之间的分数。分数100表示电子邮件非常容易阅读，分数0表示电子邮件很难阅读。
localize.tagline: 计算电子邮件的可读性分数

localize.description: 當你閱讀一封電子郵件時，你會在主題下方看到一個數字分數-一個介於0到100之間的分數。分數100表示電子郵件非常容易閱讀，分數0表示電子郵件很難閱讀。
localize.tagline: 計算電子郵件的可讀性分數

nodes.excerpt: A variety of copy templates for different industries (E-commerce, SaaS, Travel, Content, Finance, Fashion etc) specifically designed for your needs (Welcome, Free Trial, Newsletters, Feedback, Account Upgrade, Anniversary, Announcement, Consent, Offer etc)
nodes.title: Boost CTOR - A variety of ready-made email marketing copy templates
nodes.author: emreg

localize.description: 针对不同行业(电子商务、SaaS、旅游、内容、金融、时尚等)专门设计的各种复制模板(欢迎、免费试用、时事通讯、反馈、账户升级、周年纪念、公告、同意、优惠等)
localize.tagline: 各种现成的电子邮件营销文案模板

localize.description: 針對不同行業(電子商務、SaaS、旅遊、內容、金融、時尚等)專門設計的各種複製模板(歡迎、免費試用、時事通訊、反饋、賬戶升級、週年紀念、公告、同意、優惠等)
localize.tagline: 各種現成的電子郵件營銷文案模板

nodes.excerpt: Letterloop lets you create private group newsletters with friends and family. Stay in touch, grow closer together, and discover things you never knew with the most important people in your life — all over email. ⠀ Get started at letterloop.co
nodes.title: Letterloop - Create group newsletters with friends and family. ✍️
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Letterloop允许您与朋友和家人创建私人群组时事通讯。与生活中最重要的人保持联系，拉近距离，通过电子邮件发现你从来不知道的事情。⠀入门网址为letterloop.co
localize.tagline: 与朋友和家人一起创建群组时事通讯。✍️

localize.description: Letterloop允許您與朋友和家人創建私人羣組時事通訊。與生活中最重要的人保持聯繫，拉近距離，通過電子郵件發現你從來不知道的事情。⠀入門網址爲letterloop.co
localize.tagline: 與朋友和家人一起創建羣組時事通訊。✍️
